mapper.select: select sc_no, study_code, sc_title, sc_content, sc_sdate, sc_edate, sc_bar_color, sc_font_color from study_calendar where study_code = #{studyCode}
mapper.update: update study_calendar set sc_title = #{scTitle}, sc_content = #{scContent}, sc_sdate = #{scSdate}, sc_edate = #{scEdate}, sc_bar_color = #{scBarColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sc_font_color = #{scFontColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sc_no = #{scNo}
